Title: Jebel Moya: New excavations at the largest pastoral burial cemetery in sub-Saharan Africa
Abstract: © 2018 Antiquity Publications Ltd.New excavations at the Jebel Moya cemetery in Sudan reveal extensive evidence for Meroitic-era occupation, providing valuable data on contemporaneous diet, migration, exchange and population composition in sub-Saharan Africa.
